text:
Khamis Al-Owairan Al-Dosari (‎; 8 September 1973 – 7 January 2020) was a Saudi Arabian footballer. He played as a midfielder.
Al-Dosari was born in Riyadh. He played most of his career for Al-Hilal and Al-Ittihad. He also played for the Saudi Arabia national team and was a squad member at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 1998 and 2002 FIFA World Cup.
Al-Dosari died of brain cancer on 7 January 2020. He was 46.
